name: Dice Hunter Unfinished Prototype
description:
Dice Hunter V Demo (v0.1)

This is a 2nd attempt on a previously failed upload for a GMTK Game Jam 2022 
Mistakes were made ... 
Anyway, hopefully now you can try the actual game. 

Has touch support built in and should work on mobile devices, but that has not been tested. Feel free to comment if it does/doesn't work.
Lots of intended features are not working at the moment, but should have a playable demo as originally envisioned by the end of the week.
